name: Maket
description: Maket is a generative AI platform that automates architectural design, enabling architects and designers to create floorplans, 3D renders, and explore styles instantly.
longDescription: Maket is an innovative AI-driven platform designed to streamline architectural design and residential planning for architects, builders, interior designers, and developers. By leveraging generative AI, natural language processing, and deep learning, it automates the creation of customized floorplans and 3D models based on user-defined parameters, significantly reducing design time. The platform also simplifies zoning code compliance and provides real-time guidance on materials, costs, and design options through a virtual assistant. Maket’s mission is to democratize architecture, making it accessible for professionals and non-experts alike to explore creative design possibilities efficiently. Its user-friendly interface and real-time collaboration tools foster seamless interaction between stakeholders, enhancing productivity and creativity. Trusted by industry leaders, Maket is transforming the architectural workflow by combining human creativity with AI-driven insights.
features: The Plan Generator creates customized residential floorplans instantly based on user-specified parameters, optimizing design efficiency.
The Virtual Designer allows users to explore and apply diverse interior and exterior styles using text prompts, aligning designs with client preferences.
The Regulatory Assistant simplifies zoning code compliance by analyzing uploaded documents and providing instant feedback, reducing planning delays.
Real-time 3D visualization converts 2D floorplans into detailed 3D models, enhancing client understanding and engagement.
The Virtual Assistant provides expert guidance on materials, costs, and design options, enabling informed decision-making in real time.
Real-time collaboration tools enable seamless teamwork among architects, clients, and stakeholders, synchronizing project updates instantly.
The customizable material library allows users to modify designs with a vast selection of materials, meeting aesthetic and technical needs.
Interactive client presentations facilitate direct feedback and design exploration, improving client satisfaction and project alignment.
One-click integrations with popular architectural software streamline workflows by exporting designs in formats like DXF, PDF, and JPEG.
Advanced floorplan editing tools allow users to tweak layouts and save templates for future projects, reducing repetitive work.
High-fidelity rendering generates stunning visuals in seconds, helping architects present professional designs to clients quickly.
The platform supports multi-floor generation, enabling complex residential designs with accurate layout and scale.
Cost estimation tools provide accurate budgeting insights, helping users manage financial resources effectively.

faqs.question: What is Maket’s primary function?
faqs.answer: Maket uses generative AI to automate the creation of residential floorplans, 3D renders, and style explorations, streamlining architectural design.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available on Maket?
faqs.answer: Yes, Maket offers a free plan with limited features, including one active project, basic floorplan editing, and five image generation credits.

faqs.question: Can Maket help with zoning code compliance?
faqs.answer: Maket’s Regulatory Assistant analyzes zoning documents and provides instant feedback to ensure designs comply with local regulations.

faqs.question: How does Maket support collaboration?
faqs.answer: Maket provides real-time collaboration tools, allowing architects, clients, and stakeholders to work together seamlessly on a single platform.

faqs.question: Can I upload existing architectural plans to Maket?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can upload existing plans, which Maket digitizes into an editable format for further customization and 3D visualization.

faqs.question: What design styles can I explore with Maket?
faqs.answer: Maket’s Virtual Designer lets users experiment with various styles like modern, rustic, or minimalist using text prompts to match client preferences.

faqs.question: Does Maket integrate with other software?
faqs.answer: Maket offers one-click integrations with popular architectural software, allowing exports in formats like DXF, PDF, and JPEG.

faqs.question: How does Maket improve design efficiency?
faqs.answer: By automating floorplan generation and providing real-time 3D renders, Maket reduces design time and allows architects to focus on creativity.

faqs.question: Can Maket assist with cost estimation?
faqs.answer: Yes, Maket’s Virtual Assistant provides real-time cost estimation and material guidance to support effective budgeting.

faqs.question: Is Maket suitable for non-professionals?
faqs.answer: Maket’s intuitive interface makes it accessible for non-experts to design and plan renovations or new builds with AI support.
